description: A thick viscous fluid of an off-green coloration.  Created by processing various edible matter, used to allow the creation of embryos by the Gaia Nest.
A thick viscous fluid of an off-green coloration.  Created by processing various edible plant matter, used to allow the creation of embryos by the Gaia Nest.
A thick viscous fluid of an off-red coloration.  Created by processing various animal tissue, used to allow the creation of embryos by the Gaia Nest.
An orange-hued gelatinous substance commonly used as a source of nutrition for bacterial colonies.
A Petri dish with an abstract bacterial culture growing on it.
A Petri dish with a sample of soil.  You're going to have to do more work to get a single-species colony from this.
